title: JRG Automotive forms joint venture with Japan-based Takagi Seiko
description: JRG Automotive Industries has partnered with Japan's Takagi Seiko Corporation to produce automotive parts for two-wheelers and four-wheelers in India. The joint venture, based in Haryana, involves a USD 15 million investment and aims to enhance component quality using advanced technologies. The collaboration is expected to create around 500 jobs locally.
